name: Python 3 with gcloud
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates gnupg && echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg] https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt cloud-sdk main" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-cloud-sdk.list && sudo curl https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | sudo apt-key add - && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-cloud-cli && pip install --user -r requirements.txt || true
